divs: sighting detailsat about 9:30 pm on 6\30\13. m y wife and i we at our cottage on the rappahanck river.my wife was outside and called me to look at a strange light in the sky. the light was behind a tree when i went outside and did not see it until it can from behind the tree. the light was a reddish orange and made no sound.it appeared to be no more than 600 feet above the ground. we watched it move in a straight line to the northeast.the light was just as bright going as coming and was moving about 50 mph.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Tappahannock
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Very bright redish-orange orb moving smlowly and making no sound.
